title: ***FREE APP***NEW CONSTURCTION IN SMOKEY POINT, W/D, GYM, POOL, PLAYGD
posting_body: ***FREE APP***STUDIO + , NEW CONSTRUCTION, LUXURY LIVING AT SMOKEY POINT, POOL, GYM, PLAYGROUND, DOG PARK - $1,290.00 per month
Minutes to Crown Distributing, Angel of the Winds Casino and Across From Arlington Airport
Centennial Park is the pinnacle of luxury living.
We are located in the heart of Smokey Pointe, across the street from the Arlington airport.
This premium property features 1, 2 and 3 bedroom units with a variety of 21 different floor plans.
Many of the featured lofts and dens can be utilized as an office space for those who work remotely.
We also have townhomes, which are always a popular design.
Our upstairs units feature cathedral ceilings, for an open space feel.
Every unit has a washer/dryer to save you time and money.
All units feature sliding doors, you can relax and unwind on by stepping onto your own private deck/patio/Juliet oasis.
On a hot day enjoy a refreshing dip in our pool or simply lay out on our pool deck to get a tan.
Kids can enjoy our playground for hours of outdoor fun.
For our four legged friends we offer a dog park so your best friend can have an off leash experience.
We also feature sprawling lawns and a BBQ area.
If you need to entertain, you can rent out our cabana that provides a little extra space.
Centennial also offers an executive business center; with the changing needs of businesses this could be very handy.
We offer covered parking, to protect your car from the elements.
For those who have an electric car, we provide charging stations.
Centennial Park offers many amenities including a luxury gym, which adds convenience to exercising regularly.
We are also located right on the Centennial Trail, which is a 30 mile trail connecting Snohomish County and Skagit County.
Enjoy the beautiful view while you bike, run, walk or skate down this scenic trail.
See nature at it's best with the river and wildlife along its path.
We are walking distance to Walmart and other shopping/dining locations.
This is the heart of Snohomish County's industrial growth.
Thousands of acres of industrial buildings are being build as we speak, creating thousands of jobs.
Centennial Park is located right on the edge of this massive growth making this one of the most convenient locations to live.
Your new home is calling; see what we have to offer at Centennial Park.
